    • updateDroneFromDB

      public boolean updateDroneFromDB​(int intId, double dblBatteryPerc, java.lang.String strDesignation, double dblPotency, double dblWeight, double dblMaxPayload, int intBatteryCapacity, double dblBatteryVoltage, double dblEfficiency)
      Updates a Drone from the Database, basing on the atributes given by parameter
      Parameters:
      intId - Drone ID
      dblBatteryPerc - Drone Battery Capacity
      strDesignation - Drone Designation
      dblPotency - Drone Potency
      dblWeight - Drone Weight
      dblMaxPayload - Drone Max Payload
      intBatteryCapacity - Drone Battery Capacity
      dblBatteryVoltage - Drone Batteru Voltage
      dblEfficiency - Drone Battery Efficiency
      Returns:
      True if the Drone was updated, false if otherwise
